root.name: Ski or Die
root.description: GameplaySki or Die is winter sports game in which the player may compete on five different events. Snowboard Half-Pipe, score as much points as possible on a limited amount of time by making backflips, pikes and hand plants.Acro Aerials, ski down a ramp and try to get the highest score by making wicked acrobatic jumps. Downhill Blitz, as the name tells you, you do downhill skiing in which you can make large jumps and perform stunts.Innertube Trash, two players take place on two innertubes, competing each other a race downhill, to score you have to collect items. Snowball Blast, First Person snowball fightYou can practice on a single event or take your chances on a tournament. You can also do a Compete All event, where you do a marathon run on all the five events, one after the other.
